review: I recently visited Dr.Kiran Raj for a dental appointment, and I was extremely impressed with the level of professionalism and care I received. The staff on duty was friendly and welcoming, and Doctor ensured that I was comfortable throughout the entire visit. He demonstrated a high level of expertise and provided me with thorough explanations of the procedures. I felt well taken care of and reassured by their attention to detail. I highly recommend Dr. Kiran Raj for anyone looking for a dentist who prioritises professionalism and patient care.

review: Dr. Kiran Raj from Dental Frames. Known him for over 6 years now. One of the best dentist in the town. Very well qualified and experienced at his service. Has been under his treatment multiple times and always had great experience. Dr. Kiran Raj always ensured that he keeps all his patients at the comfort. Informs about the complete treatment process at every step. Very friendly and welcoming. I would suggest to walk in to his clinic for any dental related and walk out with total satisfaction with the treatment received.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Excellent and Professional dentist of Dr.Kiran Raj and give comfortable explantation about the problem and treatment. He will spend good amount of time with patient and clear doubts. I had under gone periapical cyst removal surgery. Dr.Kiran Raj gave excellent treatment and good suggestions. Post surgery I have visited more time to him without any hesitation he gave good explanations. Pre and post surgery gave minimal medications. I didn't impacted any day with my regular work because of surgery. The infrastructure of the clinic are to be highly appreciated. The whole staff is super friendly and make you feel comfortable during every visit! They have tv's in each room for your own convenience. Very clean office and nicely organized.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After a messed up root canal treatment and 5 failed crowns with 3 different dentist and totally losing hope of having permanent fix or solution, I visited Dr. Kiran honestly with lot of doubts within since I had a history of failed treatment with 3 other dentists.
Dr.Kiran not only spent time understanding the underlying issues but also gave me assurance my problem can be fixed. And subsequently in about 3 visits he fixed my problematic tooth. Really thankful to him for a wonderful treatment.
Would highly recommend him!
